description: Try our easy to follow Almond & Orange Shortbread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Almond & Orange Shortbread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Using an electric mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add flour, almond meal and zest, then stir to combine. Turn mixture onto a floured surface and knead until dough forms. Shape dough into a disc and wrap in baking paper. Rest in fridge for 30 minutes.

Roll dough between 2 sheets of baking paper until 8mm thick. Using 6 x 6cm pastry cutters, cut shapes from dough, re-rolling scraps and cutting shapes as required. Transfer to trays and chill in fridge for 20 minutes.
Bake, swapping trays between racks halfway through cooking, for 10 minutes or until light golden. Cool on trays.

To make the royal icing, whisk egg white and lemon juice in a medium bowl until frothy. Gradually whisk in sugar until combined. Add food colouring, if using, and stir to combine. Spoon mixture into a piping bag fitted with a small plain nozzle, then decorate biscuits and serve.
